snippet.title: 33 Immortals - Official Lucifer Trailer | ID@Xbox April 2024
snippet.description:
Join game designer Cem Ertekin at Thunder Lotus for a deeper look at 33 Immortals, an upcoming co-op action-roguelike for 33 players. Ertekin gives us a look at how players can help each other throughout the game, as well as the formidable Lucifer boss and gameplay tips on how to defeat this boss. Play a damned soul, and rebel against God's final judgment. Pick-up and raid, cooperate to survive hordes of monsters, defeat massive bosses, and face the wrath of God in a fight for your eternal life. 33 Immortals will be available on Xbox Series X/S, Game Pass, and Epic Games Store, and a closed beta is coming on May 24, 2024 with sign-ups available now.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
